ai-patthana24.17:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.17:0.3_0: And for the sake of nymphs are the reason for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana24.17:1.1_0: No cause for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana24.17:1.1_1: Nor causes and reasons for the sake of purification through causes and reasons.
ai-patthana24.17:2.1_0: No cause for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana24.17:2.1_1: No cause cause or reason for the sake of conjure and conditions that give rise to cause and reason.
